review: We love it. Perfect for what we need.
author: Crystal C Rumsey

review: Very easy to set up.  Includes both Netflix and Amazon prime apps
author: White collar

review: Love this.  Makes it life so convenient.
author: Kathryn Semo

review: Samsung told me that my not quite five year old tv was not compatible with Amazon Prime Streaming.  When I asked if there was a work around, the representative stated that I would have to update my television.  Not believing this could be true, I emailed Amazon Prime who quickly responded.  My television was not compatible but they supplied me with a long list of devices that were.  Since I did not want another electronic device taking up a lot of room, I ordered the Fire Stick.  It was up an running in less than 5 minutes and works beautifully.  I highly recommend it!
author: sonora

review: Love this. I actually bought 2. One for my daughter & one for my living room. Their is so much you can do on this. Great investment.
author: Heather

review: It's easy to install and works very well except for one glaring issue. You can't resume where you left off on Amazon Videos, I don't know why but it won't work. Amazon please fix this. Other than that it's great, works mostly as I expected.
author: Tye Ortiz

review: Everything I expected and at the touch of a finger. Thank you.
